Description: The following statement contains a magic number: var output = String.Format("auth_key={0}&auth_timestamp={1}&auth_version=1.0&body_md5={2}&name={3}"'  										_applicationKey'  										(int)((DateTime.UtcNow - new DateTime(1970'1'1)).TotalSeconds)'  										GetMd5Hash(request.JsonData)'  										request.EventName);
